content.rendered:
The Multi RS Solar is a LighterInverter/Charger with 450VDC 4kWp PV input weighing only 11kg. In addition, it has excellent efficiency, low standby power, and a quiet operation.
The display reads battery, inverter, and solar parameters. The same parameters can be accessed with a smartphone or other Bluetooth-enabled device, using the VictronConnect app.

48/6000 Model

Features

  • Continuous power at 25°C – Increases linearly from 4800 W at 46 VDC to 5300 W at 52 VD
  • Peak power -9000 W
  • Output AC voltage (adjustable) – 230VAC +/- 2%
  • Frequency (adjustable) – 50Hz +/- 0.1%
  • DC Input voltage range – 38 – 62 V
  • Battery charging current – 100 A
  • Three Phase and parallel operation – No

The display reads battery, inverter, and solar parameters. The same parameters can be accessed with a smartphone or other Bluetooth-enabled device, using the VictronConnect app.

48/6000 Model

Features

  • Continuous power at 25°C – Increases linearly from 4800 W at 46 VDC to 5300 W at 52 VD
  • Peak power -9000 W
  • Output AC voltage (adjustable) – 230VAC +/- 2%
  • Frequency (adjustable) – 50Hz +/- 0.1%
  • DC Input voltage range – 38 – 62 V
  • Battery charging current – 100 A
  • Three Phase and parallel operation – No
